amendment.description: An amendment numbered 60 printed in House Report 115-259 to ensure the Army Corps of Engineers is using taxpayer dollars on American-made anchor chain.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 60 printed in House Report 115-259 to ensure the Army Corps of Engineers is using taxpayer dollars on American-made anchor chain.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the DelBene amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A040) offered by Ms. DelBene.
